solution_line_template: Grant threw the ball 25% farther than Parker. If Parker threw the ball {parker_distance} yards, then Grant threw it {parker_distance}*{grant_percent_farther} = <<{parker_distance}*{grant_percent_farther}={grant_additional_distance}>>{grant_additional_distance} farther
In total, Grant threw the ball {parker_distance}+{grant_additional_distance} = <<{parker_distance}+{grant_additional_distance}={grant_total_distance}>>{grant_total_distance} yards

Kyle threw {kyle_multiplier} times farther than Grant so Kyle threw the ball {kyle_multiplier}*{grant_total_distance} = <<{kyle_multiplier}*{grant_total_distance}={kyle_total_distance}>>{kyle_total_distance} yards

If Kyle threw the ball for {kyle_total_distance} yards and Parker threw for {parker_distance} then Kyle threw the ball {kyle_total_distance}-{parker_distance} = <<{kyle_total_distance}-{parker_distance}={kyle_farther_than_parker}>>{kyle_farther_than_parker} yards farther
